What is new in this version at Click to share last processed image with others Shared via Eye-D Pro Use Eye-D Pro, this helps in navigation, image and text recognition and more. Download from: https://goo.gl/inf2tV Current address button Invite Friends App Manual Close Error in finding location. Please go back and try again. Setting up Eye-D Pro for first use 1. Ensure that TalkBack is turned on (Note that Eye-D works best with TalkBack.)\n2. Double tap the app icon to launch the app\n3. Accept the terms and conditions and provide permissions (Marshmallow and above)\n4. Double tap any item in the menu to open/start using the mode. Below explained are the menu items and functionality: Where Am I Launch the app and simply tap on Where Am I at any point of time to be location aware. It tells you your location along with list of nearby landmarks so that you can relate well to the location. Select the share location button to share the location along with nearest landmark via various channels. Travel Mode Select the button next to share location button in Where Am I to initiate travel mode. Select the desired time interval from the drop down menu to get notified about the change in location while the app is in background. Use this mode while you are taking a walk down the lane or traveling. You can also continue using other modes while Travel mode keeps updating you about your change in location. Around Me Want to find, navigate to or search for a nearby restaurant? Then select Around Me, it will give you a list of ATM, Bus Stop, Banks, Cinema, Food Joints, Hospital and Stores. Select the desired category and start exploring what‚Äôs nearby. You can search for place in the radius of 500 to 5500 meters. To increase the search radius from 500 metres to beyond simply tap on search seek bar control and use the volume up button, to decrease the radius use the volume down button. You can also search for any place by its name, tap on Entre Place Name or Type Manually Button to enter place name and start looking for it. See Objects You can use the mode to evaluate your surroundings by clicking photos of what‚Äôs in front of you. To use this mode simple tap on See Object In Image button and then follow the instructions to click an image. The app will notify you about the objects in the image and describe the scene giving you a brief idea about the surrounding. Read Text Be it a digital display, Newspaper, Book or even a handwritten document Eye-D can read it all. The reading feature is limited to English as of now and is we are all set to add a bunch of languages in near future. Eye-D Market We have designed this to put up trialModules (of-course the interesting and fascinating ones) for sale or claim from time to time. We did this so that you don‚Äôt have to waste time searching for apps or extension to improve your productivity. Live Chat Support Feel free to chat, drop a text or even call us if you are having trouble using the app or have an idea that you think should be implemented. You can even just say Hi! To us, we are good folks who love to hear to from you (Smile)
Exit

Settings Click to share your location with others on whatsapp, gmail etc. Click to refresh your current location and landmarks Share Location Show Touch Map This will open a map with your location and landmarks. As you move your finger on map, it will tell you your place and landmarks. You are at center of map. As you move along and touch a landmark, its name and distance will be announced. OK Error in accessing image file and app restart required. Going back to main screen. Please share image again. Info You don\'t have a TTS engine installed for the language. Please install a supporting TTS engine or contact via live chat for help. Advanced OCR Auto-detect languages. Please ensure that your TTS works with the specific languages. If Google TTS engine is used, language will be automatically downloaded if not found. Please message us on Live chat in case you want support. You can use PDF Reader to read any type of PDF files automatically. With PDF Reader you can read 400 pages every month. For unlimited pages reading please upgrade to PDF Reader PLUS. You can use PDF Reader Plus to read any type of PDF document that you have. You can read any language and any number of pages with this.

Waiting for better GPS accuracy GPS Accuracy: Upload Video Dialog Recording already exists. Click upload video button to start upload. You will hear progress on completion of 25 percent 50 percent 75 percent and 100 percent. You can cancel upload anytime with same button Sign Eye-D Petition #Support-Eye-D. Eye-D needs your help. Please upload your petition video using Eye-D app. Click my referral link below and select eye-d app to open link. Make sure your app is updated. Showing list of all recorded videos below. You can see size and time of creation of video file. Below that are play, upload and delete video buttons Thank you for signing Eye-D petition Hi. This is Eye-D team here and we thank you and everyone for tremendous support and love for this app so far. While we love to work on this project everyday, there are challenges we face. We are extremely short of bandwidth and funds. And for this we are looking for support from government bodies, foundations and coporations. For this we need your help. Please provide us with a video testimonial. All you need to do is press Yes, I support Eye-D button below and upload a video message on what you feel about Eye-D App and why it should be supported. Once we have enough user videos, we will make a video-chain. Thank you for listening to this message and I really hope you will lend support to Eye-D. Please note that once you click Yes, I support Eye-D button below, it might ask you for permissions like camera, storage and audio which are required to record your video. You have already recorded a video. Press cancel to go back or press OK to record again. Please record a video first. People who refer most number of people to make eye-d video will appear in Eye-D Leaderboard. LeaderBoard will appear soon here. 5. Even after uploading, you can redo your video by coming to Eye-D petition activity anytime later. 4. Click Record if you wish to record again 3. Click check recorded videos button to see list of videos and pick one to upload 2. Record video for as you as you want and click the same button to stop video recording 1. Front camera is active now. Click Record button below middle of screen to start recording. Please wait, doing setup. Front camera is active now. 1. Click Record button below middle of screen to start recording. 2. Record video for as long as you want and click the same button to stop video recording 3. Click check recorded videos button to see list of videos and pick one to upload. 4. Click Record if you wish to record again 5. Even after uploading, you can redo your video by coming to Eye-D petition activity anytime later. Are you sure you want to delete this media file? Are you sure you want to delete this video file? Video testimonial submitted. Thank you for supporting Eye-D. Google Play Services update required. Current version Required version You need to update app to continue using it. Front camera active now. Face detector library not yet available. The first time selfie camera is used, app will download a native library to the device in order to do face detection. Usually this completes before the selfie camera is run for the first time. But if that download has not yet completed, then no faces will be detected. Face detector will automatically become operational once the library download completes on device. Picture Info This trialModule needs camera permission. This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API. Tutorial Advanced OCR Tutorial Now you can save and share the recognised text using the SHARE and SAVE options respectively. You can also read the text line by line and pause reading anytime using the utility buttons present at the bottom of the screen. To read the previous line use the PREVIOUS SENTENCE button and NEXT SENTENCE button to read the next sentence. The PLAY / PAUSE button can be used anytime to pause the text reading or resume playing when paused. Please note that some contents might be subject to copyright claims and you shall be responsible for mishandling of any such documents. Advanced buttons at bottom characters found Stop realtime processing Click center of screen to start camera view processing. Tap again to process best capture picture or click stop at bottom to stop. Advanced menu at bottom of screen Start camera view processing button. Tap to start real time guidance. Once best image is obtained, you can move your camera and tap again to process. Eye-D Market is the place where you can buy more features. Each feature is available as an in-app purchase. You can try each feature for 5 days before making a purchase decision by clicking start trial. To know more about an available feature, click the feature item below. Tap on the language button to set or change your preferred OCR language. Advanced OCR will auto detect Latin based languages by default. To read saved images use the OPEN GALLEY option. You will be able to read the saved OCR results from the SAVED RESULTS option even when you are offline. Please ensure that your TTS engine works with the set language. App will automatically download the languages if Google TTS engines is used and selected language is not found. Please message us on LIVE CHAT if you are having trouble in using ADVANCED OCR. You can view this message again by clicking on info button at bottom right corner screen. Use this mode to read latin based languages even when you are not connected to internet. Camera Active. Double tap on center of screen to start processing after 50% discount. after 20% discount. Switch to Back Camera Switch to Front Camera Accessible Camera Notification Center About us Privacy policy Data Policy Facebook Twitter Website Privacy Policy Eye-D helps visually impaired be location aware, explore and navigate to nearby places of interest, evaluate surroundings with their smartphone camera and read printed text. Eye-D will serve as the true companion for most of your daily assistance needs. Eye-D is a multi-award winning for-profit startup based out of Bangalore, India. Please find more information on our social media handles below and the website. https://www.facebook.com/HelloEyeD/ https://twitter.com/HelloEyeD http://www.eye-d.in Terms and Condition Are you sure you want to delete this file? Contact us for further assistance. Travel Mode You can add a travel mode widget to home screen and you can directly control travel mode from home screen. To add widget, click add widget button below. It will open widget screen from where you will have to add it manually. Add widget Select the desired time interval from the drop down menu to get notified about the change in location while the app is in background. Use this mode while you are taking a walk down the lane or traveling. You can also continue using other modes while Travel mode keeps updating you about your change in location. Please try again New Feature "There are no e-mail ID, web links and phone numbers" Choose application to send Email "Advance OCR now has Smart Results feature. Tap on Smart Results button next to the Back Button to access Smart Results that feature all the Phone Numbers, Email Contacts and Web Links detected in the Advance Ocr results. Three more buttons , Action button , Copy to Clipboard button and Replay button are added on bottom of screen . Action button can open the dialer with the number , Open email applications with the email address or Open browser with the weblink. To use Action button , Navigate using the buttons to any of the results like numbers ,Emails or Weblinks and then tap on action button.To go back to All results tap on Show All results button. " Guidance for taking picture You have exceeded the maximum number of tries for this module. You will have to purchase it to use it. One Time Info before using Color Blob One Time Info before using OCR Guidance Color Reader is designed to help you know the color of the item in front of the camera. There are two modes, Point Color Mode and Object Color Mode. In Point Color Mode you will be notified about the color detected on the centre of the screen by the camera. While in the Object Color Mode you will be informed about the major or dominant color in the item in the camera view. Simply point your camera at any item to know its color. The Color Reader will work even when you are not connected to the internet OCR Guidance feature is designed to help you know how many corners of document you are reading is visible. Please Wait for Guidance Results One time info before using Read Text Offline after 50% discount Select a File to Upload Please install a File Manager. Failed Color Reader is designed to help you know the color of the item in front of the camera. There are two modes, Point Color Mode and Object Color Mode. In Point Color Mode you will be notified about the color detected on the centre of the screen by the camera. While in the Object Color Mode you will be informed about the major or dominant color in the item in the camera view. Simply point your camera at any item to know its color. Do let me know if you have any feedback , suggestion or problem regarding the app. I would love to hear. options to share pdf
share current page share all processed pages pdf processed using eyed pro pdf reader Previous page Next page start of pdf end of pdf Go to page Processed with Eye-D Pro 1. Share current page as text 2. Share all processed pages as text Play from beginning You need to agree to our Refund Policy before continuing by clicking "I Agree" at the bottom of this list. In case you press "Later", you will still be able to user your purchased items but will not be able to access "Eye-D Market". As Eye-D Free runs totally on support of donations made in forms of purchase by Eye-D pro users, we felt it is best to put some terms going forward.
1. All users are strongly advised to avail free trial before making a purchase as experience with a module is different on different devices. 2. Any refund will be processed strictly within only 2 days of purchase of any module. After 2 days of purchase, no refund will be made. 3. If user had not tried the module before purchasing, no refund will be made. We encourage all users to avail free trial of module to ensure that the module works as expected on their android mobile device. 4. No refund will be made if you are unable to use the feature due to unstable beta release. All users are strongly advised not to opt to be a beta tester as they are unstable. 5. In case you are unable to use feature due to bug in public version, Eye-D team will take 15 working days or less to fix the issue. If Eye-D team is not able to fix the experience, given you satisfy the conditions above, you will be given a 100% refund. 6. In case of violation of any terms, Eye-D reserves the right to issue the refund. In case Eye-D decides to issue a refund even when a condition above is violated, user will be unable to access Eye-D market for 6 months from the date of refund.
We hope you will continue supporting Eye-D Free in the form of purchases made in Eye-D Pro. Refund Policy Later Rooted phone found You are running Eye-D Pro on a rooted phone which is not permitted. Please remove root and re-install app. Dear User
Your EYE-D Pro App is currently under critical maintenance. There will be an update soon. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. For queries please write to us at ankit@eye-d.in -Team EYE-D

Important update "This feature is being migrated to Amazon backend and will be available soon with changes. Please click below for more information. "
Dear User, As per the estimate from Googles partner, Project EYE-D will be billed about INR 1400000 ($19730) for running EYE-D Free and Pro App normally. This cost is not sustainable for the project as revenue from App sales are way too less. We are thus migrating to Amazon server and this will impact EYE-D App features. Please sign the petition directed towards Mr. Sundar Pichai (CEO of Google )by clicking on the link below to urge google team to support project EYE-D and the visually impaired community by providing free Google Cloud Credits.
Dear Eye-D user, We are excited to inform that we are moving to a better platform model with technology partners like Google. This will help us bring better products at a more convenient model for all our users. As we go in to the next phase, Eye-D services will need to be stopped temporarily and will be resumed. Regret the inconvenience caused and we are thankful for your continued support. Love, Team Eye-D
